Package org.opencastproject.metadata.mpeg7

Interface Mpeg7Catalog

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable, MetadataCatalog, Mpeg7
All Known Implementing Classes:
Mpeg7CatalogImpl
public interface Mpeg7Catalog extends Mpeg7, MetadataCatalog, Cloneable
The MPEG7 catalog encapsulates MPEG-7 metadata.

  • Method Details

    • toXml

      Document toXml() throws ParserConfigurationException, TransformerException, IOException
      Saves the catalog to disk. todo think about hiding technical exceptions
      Throws:
      ParserConfigurationException - if the xml parser environment is not correctly configured
      TransformerException - if serialization of the metadata document fails
      IOException - if an error with catalog file handling occurs
